data.title: TEGAMI (Lyrics in English)
data.meta_description: A Letter to the Future: Navigating Life's Storms with Hope. English translation: Dear, I wonder where you are / and what you are doing / At fifteen, I have a seed of worry / that I can't talk to anyone about / If I write a letter to
data.text:
Dear, I wonder where you are

and what you are doing

At fifteen, I have a seed of worry

that I can't talk to anyone about

If I write a letter to my future self

I will surely be able to confess honestly

Feeling like I'm about to lose, about to cry

I, who seem to disappear

Whose words

should I believe and follow?

My only heart breaks into pieces many times

Living in pain right now

Living in the present

Dear, thank you to my fifteen-year-old self

There are things I want to convey

What am I and where should I go?

If I keep asking, it will become clear

The rough sea of youth is harsh

But sail the ship of dreams towards tomorrow's shore

Don't lose now, don't cry

When it seems like I'm about to disappear

I should believe in my own voice and keep going

Even as an adult, I get hurt

There are sleepless nights

But I live in the bitter and sweet present

Because there is meaning in everything in life

Don't be afraid, nurture your dreams

La la la, la la la

Keep on believing

La la la, la la la

Keep on believing, keep on believing, keep on believing

Feeling like I'm about to lose, about to cry

I, who seem to disappear

Whose words should I believe and follow?

Oh, don't lose now, don't cry

When it seems like I'm about to disappear

I should believe in my own voice and keep going

In any era, there is sadness

that cannot be avoided

But let's show a smile and live in the present

Let's live in the present

Dear, I wish you happiness as you read this letter
